name: Intruder Alarm - Yellow Alert
text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Special Summon 1 monster from your hand (but return it to the hand at the end of the Battle Phase), and if you do, while you control that face-up Summoned monster, your opponent's monsters cannot target other monsters for attacks. You can only activate 1 "Intruder Alarm - Yellow Alert" per turn.
